glsa.title: Courier MTA: Denial of Service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: Courier MTA has fixed a DoS issue related to usernames containing a "=" character.

background.p: Courier MTA is an integrated mail and groupware server based on open protocols.

description.p: Courier MTA has fixed a security issue relating to usernames containing the "=" character, causing high CPU utilization.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted email to a mail gateway running a vulnerable version of Courier MTA.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Courier MTA users should upgrade to the latest version:
